description: Returns a list of all the available maintenance tracks.

nested_items.name: MaintenanceTracks
nested_items.description: A list of maintenance tracks output by the DescribeClusterTracks operation.

nested_items.name: MaintenanceTrackName
nested_items.description: The name of the maintenance track. Possible values are current and trailing.

nested_items.name: DatabaseVersion
nested_items.description: The version number for the cluster release.

nested_items.name: UpdateTargets
nested_items.description: An array of  UpdateTarget objects to update with the maintenance track.

nested_items.name: MaintenanceTrackName
nested_items.description: The name of the new maintenance track.

nested_items.name: DatabaseVersion
nested_items.description: The cluster version for the new maintenance track.

nested_items.name: SupportedOperations
nested_items.description: A list of operations supported by the maintenance track.

nested_items.name: OperationName
nested_items.description: A list of the supported operations.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: The starting point to return a set of response tracklist records. You can retrieve the next set of response records by providing the returned marker value in the Marker parameter and retrying the request.
